partners.name: GIGABYTE AORUS
partners.shortDesc: Premium gaming brand specializing in high-performance gaming hardware

details.description: GIGABYTE AORUS is a premium gaming brand under GIGABYTE, specializing in high-performance gaming hardware and actively supporting esports and competitive gaming communities worldwide. They powered the entire event IDGC-2025 as the main sponsor, likely offering financial support, branding or gaming hardware.
collaborations: Provided financial support, branding or gaming hardware

partners.name: PC Builder Bangladesh
partners.shortDesc: Expert tech content creator for hardware and gadget enthusiasts

details.description: PC Builder BD creates expert tech content, reviews, guides and insights for passionate hardware and gadget enthusiasts. They contributed as the Seminar Collaboration partner for the event IDGC-2025, likely organizing or supporting a tech-focused seminar, sharing insights on gaming hardware or esports trends.
collaborations: Shared insights on gaming hardware or esports trends

partners.name: Trend Beat
partners.shortDesc: News and media platform covering trending events and social issues

details.description: Trend Beat is a news and media platform that covers and promotes trending national events, news and social issues through digital media. They joined as the Social Media Partner, promoting IDGC 2025 through online coverage and updates.
collaborations: Promoted the event through online coverage and updates

partners.name: Royal Moon Rooftop Restaurant
partners.shortDesc: Rooftop restaurant and event venue in Bhulta

details.description: Royal Moon is a rooftop restaurant and event venue in Bhulta, offering great food and a vibrant atmosphere. They were the Food Partner for the event IDGC-2025, providing food support for  guests or organizers during the event.
collaborations: Provided food support for participants, guests and organizers

partners.name: E-Sports Network Bangladesh
partners.shortDesc: Leading eSports media platform in Bangladesh

details.description: ESNBD (E-Sports Network Bangladesh) is a leading eSports media platform in Bangladesh that focuses on delivering the latest news, analysis, and coverage of the eSports industry. They joined as the Media Partner, covering and promoting IDGC 2025 to a wider gaming audience.
collaborations: Covered and promoted the event to a wider gaming audience

partners.name: NextGen Xperience
partners.shortDesc: Esports-focused production and visual support provider

details.description: NextGen Xperience brings competitive events to life through esports-focused production and visual support. As the Production Partner, they powered the event's production, enhancing the competitive vibe with expert staging and technical execution.
collaborations: Enhanced competitive vibe with expert staging and technical execution
